title: ‘It’s a Calculated Risk:’: How Q36.5 Landed Tom Pidcock in the Season’s Biggest Transfer
content:
Pidcock traded the sure bet of the WorldTour for the chance to start something new at Q36.5. How did the deal go down? ‘We all knew it was a game-changer.’

Read the full article at ‘It’s a Calculated Risk:’: How Q36.5 Landed Tom Pidcock in the Season’s Biggest Transfer on Velo.
author: ahood
